AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: The AWS Access Key ID for the IAM user this application will use.

AWS_REGION.description: The AWS region that resources such as the S3 bucket are located in.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: The AWS Secret Access Key for the IAM user this application will use.

HOSTNAME.description: The full domain name of this application, such as "my-cool-app.herokuapp.com".

MAILER_SENDER.description: The email address this application will send email from.

S3_BUCKET_NAME.description: The S3 bucket name this application will use for storage.

S3_ENDPOINT.description: Endpoint of 3rd party service providing an S3-compatible API, if you are not using AWS S3. Either AWS_REGION or S3_ENDPOINT must be specified.

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.
